protein.general_function: Involved in acid-amino acid ligase activity
protein.specific_function: Accepts ubiquitin from the E1 complex and catalyzes its covalent attachment to other proteins. In vitro catalyzes 'Lys-11'- and 'Lys-48'-, as well as 'Lys-63'-linked polyubiquitination.

reference.reference_text: Kimura M, Hattori T, Matsuda Y, Yoshioka T, Sumi N, Umeda Y, Nakashima S, Okano Y: cDNA cloning, characterization, and chromosome mapping of UBE2E2 encoding a human ubiquitin-conjugating E2 enzyme. Cytogenet Cell Genet. 1997;78(2):107-11.
